name: Ping or Pong
description:
Classic game reimagined in a new way! Trick your friend in Ping or Pong! Winner gets all treats!

- Outstanding gameplay for two players!
- Cute game characters Ping and Pong! But there is only one winner!
- Surprise your opponent with an unexpected tricky powerup!
- Try not to help your opponent with tasty treatments!
- You can turn off powerups and set party length in title screen menu
